note.p: Death: His home in Barnt Green, Birmingham, Worcestershire (19 March 1950)
Career: Professor of Chemistry in the University of Birmingham
Medals/Prizes: Davy Medal 1934; Royal Medal 1942; Nobel Prize (Chemistry) 1937
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1950-1951 vol 7 pp 373-404, plate, by E L Hirst
Dr T V Attwood, 'Uranium Isotope Separation in the UK during World War II' Ph.D Thesis 2004
